Entry.JapaneseText: そもそも、この洞窟って 何の洞窟なの？
Entry.EnglishText: What kind of caverns are these supposed to be, anyway?

Entry.JapaneseText: 昔の王様、ゴルドバが、ここで 建国の宣言と儀式を行ったって話だヨ。
Entry.EnglishText: It is said that King Goldba of yore declared the foundation of Callegea and held ceremonies in these caverns.
You're more knowledgable than I gave you credit for, <Mao>.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうハックに聞いたんだったな。
Entry.EnglishText: We got that information from Hack.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんで言っちゃうかな？ ひどいヨ、<Eugene>！
Entry.EnglishText: Why'd you have to go say that? You're mean, <Eugene>!
